mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HNYC_CORP_INFO (deptCode, deptName, corpCode, corpFullName, corpName, corpType, corpProperty, corpRegionalism, corpArea, superDeptCode, postalCode, address, tel, fa, email, http, superCorpCode, province, invoiceLabel, tarate, taNumber, accounts, status) VALUES ( #{dept_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dept_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_full_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_property, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_regionalism, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_area, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{super_dept_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fa, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{http, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{super_corp_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoice_label, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tarate, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ta_number, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accounts, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HNYC_CORP_INFO SET corpCode = #{corp_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptName = #{dept_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, superDeptCode = #{super_dept_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corpFullName = #{corp_full_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corpName = #{corp_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corpType = #{corp_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corpProperty = #{corp_property, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corpRegionalism = #{corp_regionalism, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corpArea = #{corp_area, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postalCode = #{postalcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fa = #{fa, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, http = #{http, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, superCorpCode = #{super_corp_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoiceLabel = #{invoice_label, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tarate = #{tarate, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, taNumber = #{ta_number, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accounts = #{accounts, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE deptCode = #{dept_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
